column4: i tried using Gparted as well, but it kept hanging my desktop. :S
Hanging your desktop?  That's... odd...  Although, depending on the age of the machine it might take it a little bit to scan all the drives.
I do not have a HD inside the machine I am running Ubuntu 5 on. :) It is running Live from the disc.
Ubuntu 5 had issues running live occasionally.  How much memory do you have?
